name: quote-of-the-day
description: Personalized Quote of the Day mobile application with subscription tiers

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:services" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:mobile
scripts.test:integration: docker-compose --profile test up -d && npm run test:api && docker-compose --profile test down
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:mobile
scripts.build:mobile: cd apps/mobile && flutter build apk --release && flutter build ios --release
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/api && alembic downgrade base && alembic upgrade head && python scripts/seed_database.py
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U quote_user -d quote_of_the_day_dev
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:api: cd apps/api && ruff check . && mypy src/
scripts.format: npm run format:api && npm run format:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.clean:api: cd apps/api && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/api && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../mobile && flutter pub get && cd ../../packages/shared-types && npm install && cd ../ui-components && flutter pub get && cd ../../infrastructure/aws && npm install

author: Your Organization
